revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=3Com |model=3CRWER200-75 |upc=662705504520 |asin=B000FAJS12 |fcc_date=03/17/2006 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Gemtek |manuf_model=WRTA-151G |manuf_rev=V01 |type=wireless router |fcc_id=O9C-WL537S |ic_id=2299L-WL537S |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.25 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR2316A |cpu1_cspeed=180 |cpu1_cores=1 |fla1=4 |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=Nanya |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR2316A |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=IC+ |sw_model=IP175C |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags=metal case |stock_boot=RedBoot |tp_firmware=OpenWrt, |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=3Com |default_ssid_regex=^3Com$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_pass=admin }} '''OfficeConnect''' ''Wireless 108Mbps 11g Cable/DSL Router''
"WRTA-151G_V01" and "ENG-d06-0601R RoHS" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :This device appears to be identical (besides using the 54Mbps-only AR2315A) to the [[3Com OfficeConnect 3CRWER100-75|3CRWER100-75]].
Default settings (including the SSID) are per the FCC manual.
The power adapter shown in the FCC photos is a '''3Com''' branded '''DVE''' DSA-0151A-12 A w/ '''3Com''' model 3C16760(7900-000-080) (100-120VAC ~ 50/60Hz, 0.4A -> 12VDC, 1.25A).
